key_responsibilities: Driving and staffing the Congresswoman while she is in Washington, D.C

key_responsibilities: Managing all aspects of the Congresswoman’s communications portfolio – including her earned media strategy, digital media presence, and robust franked communications program

office: House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs (Majority) Subcommittee on Health
